Z3Runner module

class Z3Runner.Z3Runner[source]

Bases: object

A class to execute Z3 models and analyze the output.

This class provides static methods to run a Z3 solver model file and analyze the output to check for a specific well-formed message indicating success.

static analyser(result) → bool[source]

Analyzes the output of a Z3 model execution.

Parameters:

result (str) – The output from the Z3 model execution.

Returns:

True if the output contains the predefined well-formed message, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

static execute_model(checker, path) → bool[source]

Executes a Z3 model file and captures its output.

Parameters:

  • checker – An object that provides logging capabilities.

  • path (str) – The file path to the Z3 model to be executed.

Returns:

True if the Z3 model output contains the well-formed message, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

The method logs the execution process and result, and handles file not found and general exceptions by logging the errors.
